column1: text
Patient is advised to take 500 mg of Paracetamol orally every 6 hours to manage fever and mild pain.
Administer 250 mg of Amoxicillin thrice daily for 7 days to treat bacterial infection.
Take 2 tablets of Ibuprofen 200 mg orally every 8 hours as needed for inflammatory pain.
Prescribe Metformin 500 mg once daily after breakfast to control blood sugar levels.
Patient should instill 1 drop of Timolol 0.5% in the left eye twice daily to manage glaucoma.
Administer 50 mg of Losartan orally once a day to control hypertension.
Take 5 ml of Cough Syrup every 8 hours to relieve persistent cough.
Patient to take 10 mg of Loratadine orally once daily for allergic rhinitis symptoms.
Administer 0.25 mg of Digoxin orally once daily to support heart function.
Prescribe 20 mg of Omeprazole orally every morning 30 minutes before breakfast for acid reflux.
Patient should take 400 mg of Gabapentin orally every 12 hours for neuropathic pain management.
Instill 2 drops of Prednisolone 1% in each eye three times daily for ocular inflammation.
Take 100 mg of Aspirin orally once daily to reduce risk of cardiovascular events.
Administer 75 mg of Clopidogrel orally once daily for antiplatelet therapy.
Patient to take 10 ml of Guaifenesin syrup every 12 hours to alleviate chest congestion.
Prescribe 0.5 mg of Alprazolam orally at bedtime for anxiety management.
Take 200 mg of Fluoxetine orally every morning to manage depressive symptoms.
Administer 50 mg of Hydrochlorothiazide orally once daily for blood pressure control.
Patient is advised to take 1 tablet of Vitamin D 1000 IU daily to maintain bone health.
Instill 1 drop of Latanoprost 0.005% in each eye at bedtime for glaucoma treatment.
